word: AND TO ANY WHO MAY BE TEMPTED, BECAUSE OF FINANCIAL PRESSURES, TO ACCEPT AN INVITING OFFER OF A LARGER INCOME IN LINES OF WORK NOT DIRECTLY CONNECTED WITH THE CAUSE OF GOD, THE CHAPTER, "COUNSEL TO ONE WHO FOR FINANCIAL REASONS, WAS PLANNING TO LEAVE THE WORK OF GOD," WILL OFFER CHALLENGING AND SOBERING THOUGHTS. IN ALL THESE ELLEN G. WHITE MESSAGES THE SPIRIT OF CHRIST, WHICH IS THE SPIRIT OF SACRIFICE, IS THE KEYNOTE.--WHITE TRUSTEES.
